catalog_info.title: Advanced Russian: Readings in Russian Literature
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Russian 103, 114, or placement at this level or above.
catalog_info.description: Reading and discussion of classic and contemporary Russian literature. Continued work on vocabulary expansion and composition. Written exercises for reinforcement. Readings from authors such as Gogol, Chekhov, Bulgakov, Pasternak, Brodsky, and Bitov.
